results.text: ይህ እርሱ በእውነት ግልጽ ፈተና ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእርሱም ላይ በኋለኞቹ ሕዝቦች ውስጥ መልካም ዝናን አስቀረንለት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በኢስሐቅም አበሰርነው፡፡ ከመልካሞቹ የሆነ ነቢይ ሲሆን፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
